react

Class MultiFailureException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • react.MultiFailureException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class MultiFailureException
extends RuntimeException
    NOTE: this class is a modified version of the real MultiFailureException which omits the Throwable.printStackTrace(java.io.PrintWriter) override, which GWT can't handle. Do not modify this class directly, but rather propagate changes from the real version hereto.
    See Also:
